title: BBC Local Live: Nottinghamshire on Monday 12 December 2016 - BBC News
summary: man , 43 , bailed over one of two sneinton murders .
brothers banned from city tram network .
five new train services from radcliffe-on-trent .

text: that 's all from local live today .
join us again tomorrow .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: new chief constable officially appointed
text: the appointment of nottinghamshire 's new chief constable craig guildford has today been formally backed by the county 's police and crime panel .

documents.title: five years in jail if brothers ride tram
text: on at least two occasions in june 2016 , net staff had to escort the brothers off the tram for not having purchased tickets .
on one occasion they were each given £ 50 fixed penalty notices , the city council said .
these brothers caused immense alarm , harassment and distress to passengers , '' councillor , nicola heaton , said .
if either of the brothers rides the tram in the next two years they risk facing a five-year prison sentence .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: pair banned from trams
text: two brothers have been banned from nottingham 's entire tram network after repeated fare evasion and anti-social behaviour .

lloyd rusell , 25 , and jason russell , 34 , both of no fixed abode , were sentenced to 26 weeks , suspended for 12 months , and fined £ 285 and £ 200 respectively at nottingham magistrates court on wednesday .
in september a tram passenger filmed the pair being abusive to passengers who asked them to stop shouting and swearing and uploaded it to facebook .
the footage was used to identify the brothers , according to nottingham city council .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man bailed over sneinton murder
text: a 43-year-old man arrested in connection with one of the two murders in sneinton this weekend has been released on bail .
a 19-year-old , arrested on sus of the murder of martin maughan , 27 , remains in custody .
no arrests have been made in connection with the murder of a 38-year-old man in the early hours of sunday .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man killed in a617 crash
text: police have now confirmed that a man died in the crash at hockerton this morning .
a van and a lorry collided on the a617 just after 08:00 .
the road is expected to stay closed until about 18:00 .
author: Heather Burman
Journalist, BBC News Online

documents.title: hotel boss 'leered ' at woman
text: a young kirkby mum has told of the horrifying '' moment she caught a best western manager leering at her '' through her hotel window when she was alone on a business trip .
author: Mansfield Chad

documents.title: a617 crash : 'very serious '
text: the a617 remains closed after a crash near hockerton this morning .
police are still waiting for an update from the officer at the scene but they described it as `` very serious '' .
we 'll let you know the latest as we get it .
assisting with a road closure at the a617 , a612 junction following an rtc .
please look for an alternative route .
a617 will remain closed for some time .
traffic from newark is being directed onto the a612 towards upton village .
colleagues taking over the road closure , a617 road still closed traffic from newark diverted through upton village a612 .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: extra cash to fill potholes
text: few things get drivers more annoyed than potholes .
well , good news - an extra £ 340,000 has been allocated to help repair potholes in nottinghanshire .
the county council 's contractor via has been given the cash to spend during the next financial year bringing the total budget to almost £ 1.2m .
the most urgent repairs will happen this winter with the rest of the work happening from spring next year .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: clarke 'not a snappy dresser '
text: `` i feel sorry for women in politics , '' mr clarke said .
`` i 'm glad to say men in politics do n't have great news stories about what they are wearing .
`` in my case , apart from my suede shoes , i 'm probably very lucky because i 'm not a very snappy dresser . ''
and here are those famous hush puppies , in case you 'd forgotten
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: trousergate 'tedious ' - clarke
text: rushcliffe mp ken clarke has been having his say about the row over theresa may 's trousers
it 's fair to say he 's not impressed , telling the sunday politics it was `` tedious '' that stories about what women politicians were wearing featured in the newspapers .
here 's his full interview

it 'll get five extra trains calling in on weekdays .

text: the mother of a man stabbed to death in nottinghamshire has paid tribute to her son .

documents.title: is enough being done to tackle knife crime in notts ?
text: police insist they have a grip on the situation , despite the stabbings .
earlier this year , plans were mooted for knife amnesty bins in the county but they never materialised .

`` we have dedicated officers dealing with knife crime and we 're targeting people who we know habitually carry knives - we are using intelligence from the community to target those individuals , '' said ch insp mark stanley .
he said they 're still looking into bringing amnesty bins like the one to nottinghamshire streets .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : a617 diversions in place
text: at this time we are diverting traffic off the a617 onto the a612 through upton village to avoid the rtc .

documents.title: listen : 'we want to move away from sneinton '
text: people in sneinton have been giving their reaction to the double stabbings .
understandably many are very concerned .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'serious crash ' on a617
text: police have closed the a617 in both directions near hockerton after a serious crash which happened just after 8:00 .
`` crash investigators are on the scene and are advising drivers to avoid the area at the newark side of hockerton , '' the force has said .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: forest-derby : 'poor ' second half
text: nottingham forest head coach philippe montanier says his side 's second-half at derby was very poor , technically , tactically and physically .
the reds lost 3-0 at pride park to end a run of three consecutive wins .
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: montanier exasperated by forest display
text: montanier exasperated by forest display

documents.title: latest headlines for nottinghamshire
text: here are today 's top stories :
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'fear in the community '
text: ch insp mark stanley spoke on the radio after hearing from sneinton residents , one of which said she was considering leaving because of the killings .
he said : `` the majority felt it was safe but these two incidents will create fear in the community and people will be wondering why has this happened . ''
`` these are self-contained incidents among people who knew each other at houses where they were invited in . ''
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: murders 'not linked '
text: ch insp mark stanley , of nottinghamshire police , has said despite the fact both victims knew each other , they 're being treated as separate incidents .
`` the feeling at the moment is they 're not linked , '' he told bbc radio nottingham this morning .
`` sneinton and st ann 's is a very close community , people know people across the area but we 're treating them as separate incidents . ''
he said a 19-year-old is still in custody on sus of the murder of mr maughan .
officers are `` actively seeking '' someone in connection with the second murder but have not named the suspect publicly .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: victim 'did n't look for trouble '
text: martin maughan has been described as lovely , friendly and kind and someone who did n't look for trouble .
here 's my report from the scene .
author: Quentin Rayner
East Midlands Today chief news reporter

documents.title: stabbings : what we know so far
text: martin maughan , 27 , was found stabbed in west walk , sneinton , just after 06:00 on saturday .
the 38-year-old man , who 's not yet been named was found in mill view close at about 04:20 .
neighbours told the bbc someone at the party stole the host 's phone , he chased him and was stabbed , it 's believed three times .
two men , aged 19 and 43 , were arrested over the first stabbing and are being questioned by detectives .
they 're looking for another man in relation to the second stabbing , but have not said whether or not he was at the party .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: sneinton murders : second victim was at party for first
text: sneinton is in shock this morning after two men who were believed to be friends were stabbed to death less than 24 hours apart this weekend .
martin maughan , 27 , was found in west walk in sneinton early on saturday morning .
the second man - a 38-year-old - was found with stab wounds to his chest in mill view close early on sunday .
he 'd been holding a party celebrating the life of his friend , the bbc 's been told .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : a38 crash
text: an earlier accident on the a38 in sutton-in-ashfield is causing delays between the b6023 alfreton road and the b6018 sutton road .
author: BBC Travel
